document.full_text: oil prices fell on friday after libyan leader muammar gaddafi's government said it would halt military action in response to a u.n. resolution for an immediate ceasefire.
document.title: oil falls after libya calls halt to military action
lines_and_colors: oil prices fell on friday after libyan leader muammar gaddafi's government said it would halt military action in response to a u.n. resolution for an immediate ceasefire.
